overview:
Since 2006, Emitac Mobile Solutions LLC (EMS) has been a leader in the delivery, implementation and support of BlackBerryÂ® solutions in the Middle East. Based in Dubai with presence throughout the region, EMS is a wholly owned subsidiary of the Emitac Group, a pioneer in Information Technology formed in the Middle East nearly 40 years ago.

EMS is the Strategic Channel Partner of Research In Motion (RIM), the company behind the popular BlackBerry handheld devices, hardware and software solutions. As a leading solutions and service provider, EMS follows in the footsteps of the Emitac Group, providing high-end business solutions through strategic global partnerships and affiliations with such giants as HP, Philips, MicrosoftÂ® and OracleÂ®.

Currently, EMS focuses on government agencies and institutions, businesses, consumers and mobile operators in the Middle East and South Asia.

BlackBerry â€” A New Standard in Mobility Solutions

BlackBerry solution goes well beyond traditional mobility solutions to incorporate lightweight and functionally powerful handheld devices with professional software solutions. The result is the ability to communicate well beyond the office â€” wirelessly and conveniently.

The BlackBerry device is “always on,” connected at all times via the userâ€™s mobile data network. The proprietary Push Email technology â€œpushesâ€ all emails directly to the device upon its arrival in the userâ€™s inbox, keeping the user up to date at all times.

As a market leader in BlackBerry solutions and service, EMS has extensive experience in BlackBerry solution deployments in Europe, the Middle East, Africa and Asia. With customer care priority one, the EMS team provides a comprehensive offering, including implementation, engineering, distribution, sales, marketing and technical support services.

Our Pre-launch and In-life teams are devoted to the customized requirements of project management and execution, ensuring each customerâ€™s needs are well cared for, from the very first handshake and throughout our relationship.
